name: rTrakt
author: Subestro
short: Shows your Trakt scrobbler status in the bot's rich presence.
description: This cog integrates with the Trakt API to show your currently playing media in the bot's rich presence. The user can authorize the Trakt API using commands.

commands.name: generatecodes
commands.brief: Generates a new client ID and client secret for the Trakt API.
commands.description: Generates a new client ID and client secret for the Trakt API, and stores them in the cog's configuration.

commands.name: displaycode
commands.brief: Displays the client ID and client secret for the Trakt API.
commands.description: Displays the client ID and client secret for the Trakt API that are currently stored in the cog's configuration.

commands.name: pollauth
commands.brief: Polls for authorization to access the Trakt API.
commands.description: Displays an authorization link that can be used to authorize the bot to access the Trakt API for your account.

commands.name: successauth
commands.brief: Stores the access and refresh tokens for the Trakt API.
commands.description: Stores the access and refresh tokens for the Trakt API in the cog's configuration, allowing the bot to access the Trakt API on behalf of your account.
